name: xrsh
description: xrsh is a self-hosted remote shell access platform that exposes command-line environments through a browser-based terminal, letting users reach remote systems securely without native SSH clients.
features: Browser-based terminal: Access remote shells through any modern web browser without installing SSH clients.
Secure connections: Establish encrypted SSH connections over HTTPS with certificate-based authentication.
Session persistence: Resume disconnected terminal sessions automatically when network connectivity returns.
Multi-tab support: Open multiple terminal sessions in browser tabs for parallel remote work.
Copy-paste functionality: Transfer text between local clipboard and remote terminal with keyboard shortcuts.
Responsive design: Use terminals on mobile devices and tablets with touch-optimized controls.
Customizable appearance: Adjust font sizes, color schemes, and terminal dimensions for comfortable viewing.
Keyboard mapping: Configure custom key bindings and shortcuts to match local terminal preferences.
Connection profiles: Save frequently used SSH configurations for quick access to remote systems.
Audit logging: Record terminal sessions for security compliance and troubleshooting purposes.
File transfer: Upload and download files through the web interface alongside terminal access.
Authentication methods: Support password, public key, and two-factor authentication for secure access.
